docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message.
docs.title: Commands

docs.text: mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: vue router alias to use alias, const router = new Router({ routes: [ { path: '/settins', component: Settings, children: [ {path: 'profile', component: Profile, alias: ''}, {path: 'posts', component: Posts}, ] } ] }) 注意一个路由route必须包含一个component, 否则不能显示, 例如写成下面的形式: children: [ {path: '', alias: 'profile'}, {path: 'profile', component: Profile}, {path: 'posts', component: Posts}, ] 那么页面跳转到 '/settins 和 '/settings/profile' 时, 都是显示的空.
docs.title: vue router

docs.text: to use alias, const router = new Router({ routes: [ { path: '/settins', component: Settings, children: [ {path: 'profile', component: Profile, alias: ''}, {path: 'posts', component: Posts}, ] } ] }) 注意一个路由route必须包含一个component, 否则不能显示, 例如写成下面的形式: children: [ {path: '', alias: 'profile'}, {path: 'profile', component: Profile}, {path: 'posts', component: Posts}, ] 那么页面跳转到 '/settins 和 '/settings/profile' 时, 都是显示的空.
docs.title: alias

docs.text: vuex module 当使用 namespaced 为 true 时, 需要注意的是 对于 state , 已经默认是添加了namespace, 而对于 mutation , action , 和 getters , 都是以slash分隔开的. i.e. new Store({ modules: { account: { namespaced: true, state: { name: '' }, mutations: { change(state) { } } } } }) { state: {} } 在组件内使用时, 对state就不能在 mapState 中使用字符串的形式, 而要写成函数的形式. { computed: { ...mapState({name: state => state.account.name}) }, methods: { ...mapMutations({change: 'account/change'}) } }
docs.title: vuex

docs.text: 当使用 namespaced 为 true 时, 需要注意的是 对于 state , 已经默认是添加了namespace, 而对于 mutation , action , 和 getters , 都是以slash分隔开的. i.e. new Store({ modules: { account: { namespaced: true, state: { name: '' }, mutations: { change(state) { } } } } }) { state: {} } 在组件内使用时, 对state就不能在 mapState 中使用字符串的形式, 而要写成函数的形式. { computed: { ...mapState({name: state => state.account.name}) }, methods: { ...mapMutations({change: 'account/change'}) } }
docs.title: module
